info.name: Sable Weapons
info.description: Weapons created or found by members of the Sable Cross
info.author: JCDM

description.p: The iron of this massive greatsword is uniquely shaped, as though it were forged by intent rather than heat and pressure, and the hilt is crafted out of dark wood from the heart of the Blackthorn Grove. This blade hungers for the iron contained within blood. On a hit, the target takes an extra 2d6 necrotic damage as the blade extracts the precious metal, slowly adding length and breadth to the ever-growing blade.

As a bonus action, you can impale a corpse with this blade to extract the blood that remains. You gain 10 temporary hit points that last 1 hour. Once a corpse has been drained by this weapon, it can’t be used again in this manner.

This longsword is made of an unusual blackened metal with a faint, poison-green iridescence.
This weapon gives a +1 to hit and attack. On hit, deals an additional 1d8 acid damage.

This shortsword is made of an unusual blackened metal with a faint, poison-green iridescence.
This weapon gives a +1 to hit and attack. On hit, deals an additional 1d8 acid damage.

This shortsword is made of an unusual blackened metal with a faint, poison-green iridescence.
This weapon gives a +1 to hit and attack. On hit, deals an additional 1d6 acid damage.

This Heavy Crossbow is made of an unusual blackened metal with a faint, poison-green iridescence.
This weapon gives a +1 to hit and attack. On hit, deals an additional 1d6 acid damage.
This crossbow bolt is constructed from a thick shaft of dark, hard wood, with a tip made of an unusual blackened metal with a faint, poison-green iridescence and fletched with black feathers.
This weapon gives a +1 to hit and attack. On hit, deals an additional 1d4 acid damage.
